name: Space Shooter Test V0.1
description:
NOTE: Contains belly expansion fetish content.

Here's a game demo test thingy made in GameMaker Studio 2. You play as a spaceship flying over an ocean, with giant robot girls flying down from the top of the screen.

WASD to move, hold Space to fire water
When a robot girl is full of water, she'll fall into the water after a short time.
Run your ship into an inflated robot girl to pop her instead.
Running into a robot girl's face will disable firing for a second, but no lasting damage.

Planned Features:
More enemy types & a boss fight
Scoring system
Powerups
Sound Effects
